text: Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kangaete mita no ka, moshi (kuruan ga) arra no omoto karadeari, sore o anata gata wa kyohi shi, shikamo, Isuraeru no shison no hitori ga sore (musa no rippo) to, onaji monodearu to rissho shi, sore de kare jishin kuruan o shinjita no ni, anata gata wa (Nao) koman ni mo shinjinakatta to sureba (anata gata wa fugi no to ni naru node wa nai no ka). Hontoni arra wa, fugi no min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
